mainButtonLabelConversion.title: Conversion Button Text
mainButtonLabelConversion.description: Configures a custom text value for the main button in the password dialog popup where the storage type volume is HFS and we need to convert the volume. (Default Convert)

title.title: Title
title.description: Configures a custom Title for the dialog popup

subTitleEXFAT.title: Erase EXFAT Volume Text
subTitleEXFAT.description: Configures a custom text value for the dialog that notifies the user that the removable disk is not encrypted and the storage type is Microsoft Visual Data, in order to encrypt it we need to erase the disk and we lose all existing content.

notifyUser.title: Generate end-user notifications
notifyUser.description: Configures if we want to notify the user. default is true

placeholderPassword.title: Password Placeholder Text
placeholderPassword.description: Configures a custom password placeholder for the dialog popup

subTitleProgress.title: Progress Bar Text
subTitleProgress.description: Configures a custom text value for the Disk encryption Progress in the dialog popup

secondaryButtonLabelHint.title: Hint Secondary Button Text
secondaryButtonLabelHint.description: Configures a custom text value for the secondary button in the hint dialog popup

subTitlePassword.title: Password Description Text
subTitlePassword.description: Configures a custom text value for the dialog that notifies the user that the removable disk is not encrypted.

iconPath.title: Icon Path
iconPath.description: Configures a custom icon path for within the dialog pop-ups. (default uses FileVault icon)

notificationApp.title: swiftDialog Path
notificationApp.description: Sets a custom path of the binary. default is /usr/local/bin/dialog

subTitleHint.title: Second Hint Text
subTitleHint.description: Configures a custom text value for the Hint in the dialog popup

batteryExitMainButton.title: Exit Button Battery
batteryExitMainButton.description: Configure the exit button text once the Mac is not on AC power. default is Exit

notifyUserHint.title: Allow Hint
notifyUserHint.description: Allows and generates a additional alert to provide the end-user a option to set a password hint. default is true

subTitleBattery.title: Battery Dialog Text
subTitleBattery.description: Configures a custom text value when the Mac is not connected to AC power and not able to encrypt removable devices.

passwordRegex.title: Password Requirements REGEX
passwordRegex.description: Configure this if the password does needs to meet a pattern. Set a valid REGEX string. (default requires 4 characters)

passwordRegexErrorMessage.title: Password Requirement Message
passwordRegexErrorMessage.description: Specify the message that a end-user gets when the provided password does not match the requirements

downloadSwiftDialog.title: Download swiftDialog
downloadSwiftDialog.description: Configures if swiftDialog needs to be downloaded if not present on endpoint. default is true

mainButtonLabelEXFAT.title: Erase Button Text
mainButtonLabelEXFAT.description: Configures a custom text value for the main button in the password dialog popup where the storage type volume is Microsoft Visual Data and we need to erase the volume. (Default Erase existing data and encrypt)

hintRegexErrorMessage.title: Hint Requirements Message
hintRegexErrorMessage.description: Specify a custom message that a end-user gets when the provided hint does not match the requirements

mainButtonLabelProgress.title: Exit Button Text
mainButtonLabelProgress.description: Configures a custom text value for the exit button in the dialog popup

mainButtonLabelHint.title: Hint Main Button Text
mainButtonLabelHint.description: Configures a custom text value for the main button in the hint dialog popup

hintRegex.title: Hint Requirements REGEX
hintRegex.description: Configure this if the hint does needs to meet a pattern. Set a valid REGEX string. (default requires 6 characters if hint set)

secondTitlePassword.title: Password Text
secondTitlePassword.description: Configures a custom text value for the password in the dialog popup

exitButtonLabel.title: Exit Button Text
exitButtonLabel.description: Configures a custom text value for the exit button. default is cancel

batteryIconPath.title: Battery Icon Path
batteryIconPath.description: Configures a custom icon path for the dialog warning the user that the Mac is not on AC power. (default uses Stop icon)

secondaryButtonLabelPassword.title: Password Secondary Button Text
secondaryButtonLabelPassword.description: Configures a custom text value for the secondary button in the password dialog popup

mainButtonLabelPassword.title: Password Main Button Text
mainButtonLabelPassword.description: Configures a custom text value for the main button in the password dialog popup (Default Continue)

subTitleConversion.title: Conversion Dialog Text
subTitleConversion.description: Configures a custom text value for the dialog that notifies the user that the removable disk is not encrypted and we need to convert it to APFS in order to encrypt it.

titleProgress.title: Title Progress Bar
titleProgress.description: Configures a custom Title for the Progress Bar dialog popup
